titles: A boke of prayers called ye ordynary faschyon of good lyuynge
publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the George nexte to saynt Dunstons churche by Wyllyam Myddylton,
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: Ordynary. of lyuynge.
Identified as STC 3326a on UMI microfilm, reel 738.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
